NomaiObject: solely 1 COLEUS: Melorae! The orcnids have surfaced again! The quantum shard study can wait: let us join our friends outside in studying the environment and lifeforms for any signs of a cause behind this phenomenon! 2 1 MELORAE: Goodness, did you entangle with the quantum shard to bring me this news in such a hurry? You appeared out of thin air after I merely blinked! 3 2 COLEUS: The Hanging City's gravity crystals are so extremely handy.. Now that we've attached one to the quantum shard, we can so easily travel between chambers of the Looming City through quantum entanglement! 4 3 MELORAE: A tinge of dread fills me every time I see you disappear with the quantum shard, Coleus. I am proud of your great discovery - but I cannot help but prefer you to travel by foot patiently! 5 4 COLEUS: Melorae, you musn't let that incident weigh on you so! It was mostly my own fault getting carried away experimenting with my findings. 6 5 MELORAE: You are hereby forbidden from making puns again, Coleus. Stay there! I'll capture a photo of you with the camera so you won't disappear from my sight again! 7 6 MELORAE: Alright, I am ready. Are you sure this is safe, Coleus? After studying the mislabelled cairns in the Gallery Chamber, Thatch posited some quantum objects sometimes disappear from existence entirely.. I genuinely fear for our safety. 8 7 COLEUS: I believe the possibility is unlikely enough not to be of concern, but there is indeed still much we do not yet understand about quantum phenomena. 9 8 COLEUS: Still, it seems inevitable that we will become entangled living in this space, one way or another. Just earlier, the projection pool took me with it to another chamber after I'd used it to project elsewhere! 10 9 COLEUS: Hm... Melorae? The shard does not desire to move at this time for some reason. This is strange. I was able to travel together with Thatch on the shard earlier. 11 10 MELORAE: What? I was distracting myself from my fears with the photo I took. 12 11 MELORAE: How intriguing.. The shard truly no longer desires to move. We have never observed this before. Could my observing of this photo somehow be.. locking the quantum shard in place? 13 12 COLEUS: Hypothesis confirmed! Hypothesis confirmed! Forget the orcnids, you've discovered a new quantum rule, Melorae!! My mentor and I are officially the greatest quantum geologists of our clan!
